title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7205.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7205.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of this Part shall be to provide a mechanism
and procedure by which a local correctional facility may seek and acquire
commission approval of an agreement to detain the inmates of another state
pursuant to section
500-o
of the

Correction Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7205.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
